SELECT ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY LEFT(CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONVERT(DATETIME, FAC_FIX.FFX_DATE, 120), 120), 10)) AS ROW_NUM, FACILITY.FAC_NO, FAC_FIX.FFX_NO, FACILITY.FAC_NO, FACILITY.FAC_NAME, LEFT(CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONVERT(DATETIME, FAC_FIX.FFX_DATE, 120), 120), 10) AS FFX_DATE,
FAC_FIX.FFX_MAN, FAC_FIX.FFX_WRK, REPLACE(CONVERT(VARCHAR,CONVERT(MONEY,FAC_FIX.FFX_COST),1),'.00','') AS FFX_COST, FAC_FIX.FFX_NOTE, FAC_FIX.FILE_NAME1, FAC_FIX.FILE_NAME2
FROM FAC_FIX INNER JOIN FACILITY ON FAC_FIX.FAC_CODE = FACILITY.FAC_CODE
WHERE FAC_FIX.FFX_DATE BETWEEN #{sdate} AND #{edate} ORDER BY ROW_NUM

SELECT FFX_NO , FAC_CODE, LEFT(CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONVERT(DATETIME, FAC_FIX.FFX_DATE, 120), 120), 10) AS FFX_DATE , LEFT(CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONVERT(DATETIME, FAC_FIX.FFX_DATE, 120), 120), 7) AS FFX_MONTH, FFX_WRK , FFX_EVT , FFX_NOTE , FFX_COST , FFX_MAN , FFX_TIME , LEFT(CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONVERT(DATETIME, FAC_FIX.FFX_NEXT, 120), 120), 10) AS FFX_NEXT, FFX_END, FILE_NAME1, FILE_NAME2 FROM FAC_FIX WHERE FFX_NO = #{ffx_no}
mapper.insert: insert into FAC_FIX (FFX_NO ,FAC_CODE, FFX_DATE, FFX_NOTE, FFX_WRK, FFX_COST, FFX_MAN , FFX_EVT , FFX_TIME, FFX_NEXT, FFX_END, FILE_NAME1,FILE_NAME2) values ((select isnull(max(FFX_NO), 0)+1 as "FFX_NO" from FAC_FIX),#{fac_code}, #{ffx_date}, #{ffx_note}, #{ffx_wrk}, #{ffx_cost}, #{ffx_man}, #{ffx_evt} ,#{ffx_time}, #{ffx_next},#{ffx_end},#{file_name1},#{file_name2})
